item.description:
BOSTON TEA PARTY 2010
http://www.masslpa.or...

In most people's lives there are not many opportunities to be a part of making history. At Faneuil Hall on Dec 12, 2010, just as it was on Dec. 16, 1773, history will be made. You will stand on the very spot where so many of our famous Founding Fathers stood... you will hear what they said and what needs to be said by us again! There will be a packed hous...e so do not miss your chance, get your reservation in now before there are no more seats available.

"... Every friend to his country, to himself and to posterity, is now called upon to meet at Faneuil Hall..." --from the Handbill posted all over Boston, November 29, 1773.

The Liberty Preservation Assoc. of Massachusetts (MassLPA) is Chief Sponsor this year of BTP2010, on 12-12-2010, between 12:00 - 5:00 pm.
This is the annual event in Faneuil Hall, given to Boston in 1742, the meeting place of the Sons of Liberty, and proclaimed the "The Cradle of Liberty", Faneuil Hall Marketplace, Boston, Massachusetts 02109.

11:00 AM. The DOORS of Faneuil Hall WILL OPEN for the Event for Info Table Access and First Come First Serve seating.
BTP1773 Sites Escorted Tour: 9:30 - 11:00 AM.

BTP2010 has a Great Line-up of Powerful Speakers and Liberty & Freedom Leaders from around the country!
A Call to Action for Constitutional Restoration and Building Beyond the 2010 Successes of the Power of the Ballot Box!

SPEAKERS Confirmed:
PASTOR GARRETT LEAR - The Patriot Pastor, Pastor to Patriots
GOVERNOR GARY JOHNSON - Governor of New Mexico '95-'02
SHERIFF RICHARD MACK - Author: County Sheriff, America's Last Hope
REP. JENN COFFEY - NH State Rep., Nat. Coord.-2nd Amendment Sisters
SENATOR BOB HEDLUND - Mass. State Senator, talk show host
PETER SCHIFF – Economist
G. EDWARD GRIFFIN - Author: The Creature from Jekyll Island
JOHN MCMANUS - President, The John Birch Society
STEWART RHODES - Founder of Oath Keepers
GARY FRANCHI - Founder of Restore the Republic
DAVID R. GILLIE - Rediscovery of the American Civic Creed
ADAM KOKESH - Congressional candidate and talk show host
JORDAN PAGE - liberty songwriter/musician
PETER SCHIFF - EuroPacific Capital

We are selling 700 General Admission TICKETS.
ADVANCE: $25. Check or Money Order (instructions below)
DOOR, day of Event: $30. Cash or Money Order only at the door.

100 VIP TICKETS available for $100 ea. - PREFERRED SEATING in the Faneuil Hall first 4 rows, and AFTER EVENT DINNER with Speakers ($25.00 voucher)
After Event Dinner at Durgin Park in Faneuil Hall Marketplace 6:00 - 9:00 pm. Only 45 left.

ACCOMODATIONS, group rate, at the Historic OMNI PARKER HOUSE, celebrating over 150 Years of Excellence as America's Longest Continuously Operating Hotel. Block of rooms reserved for Dec. 11 & 12.
Hotel restaurant open for breakfast Sunday 7:00 AM. Kennedy's Restaurant around the corner open Sunday 9:30 AM for Brunch.
About a 5-minute walk to Faneuil Hall.
Contact Dan McGonigle for the group code to make your reservations asap. 617-953-1646 or phgivemeliberty1775@yahoo.com

ADVERTISING SPACE in the EVENT PROGRAM Booklet is available.
Corporate/Group/Individual. 2.125 x 5.5- 1/4 pg $25, -- 4.25 x 5.5- 1/2 pg $50, -- 8.5 x 5.5- Full pg $100. Your artwork.
Contact Roland Gonzalez 508-241-2396
or realfreedog@yahoo.com

CO-SPONSORSHIPS available: $400 ea. Includes Full Page Ad in Event Program Booklet, One VIP Ticket, 2 Gen. Admission Tickets, and a $25.- Voucher for After Event Dinner with the Speakers. Info Table Space is SOLD OUT.
Contact Bob Dwyer

SPECIAL SHOWING of G. EDWARD GRIFFIN's New Documentary Film
Saturday, Dec. 11, 2:00 PM. "What In The World Are They Spraying?" -- The Chemtrail / Geo-Engineering Coverup.
AMC Loews Boston Common, Tremont St.
10-minute walk from the Omni Parker House Hotel
http://www.masslpa.or...

For Ticket Reservations, Co-Sponsorship, or Movie Tickets,
go to http://www.masslpa.or...

or Contact: Bob Dwyer at 508-930-5530
or Bob.Dwyer@MassLPA.org

Ticket Purchase by Check or Money Order made Payable to "MassLPA", Mail to:
MassLPA
496 Reed Rd
Dartmouth MA 02747
Please include your return address for ticket mailing.

Thank You in advance
Sincerely,
Bob Dwyer
President – MassLPA

VIDEO PROMOTING BTP2010 - GARY FRANCHI and BOB DWYER
http://www.youtube.co...

Historic Faneuil Hall
http://www.celebrateb...
item.name: BOSTON TEA PARTY 2010 - Gary Johnson, Peter Schiff and More!
